titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inouye. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/31/2007--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation for the 110th Congress.
